name: SuperPiouPiou
description:
SuperPiouPiou is a vertical shmup made in 20 days during the #2wAzpioupiou.

This is an early prototype of what the game will be. The sprites and sounds are made by me and placeholders for now. There's no music and no real background.  This version only support keyboard controls.

Shoot the enemies and advance to the end of the stage to get the high score !

New v0.2 adds a weapon upgrade system. Grab the blue collectible to power up your weapon. Contact:

My twitter(@AzStrocyte)

I can also be reached at hibou@acdcfan.com. Please send me  your feedback or your score or both.

Tell me what you liked and what you didn't like about the game !

!!(OvO)!!
